name: Align Weapon, Communal
text: This spell functions as align weapon, except you divide the duration in 1-minute increments between any number of touched weapons. Every group of up to 50 projectiles (which must be together at the time of casting) counts as one weapon for the purpose of dividing the spell’s duration.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害, 物体)
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同阵营武器（Align Weapon）一般，不过你能够以1分钟为单位将持续时间分配至接触到的武器上，数量任意。在分配法术的持续时间时，一组弹药（至多50发，并且在施法时要放在一起）被算作一把武器。
